General.Name: Landmarks Bhd
General.Description: Landmarks Berhad, an investment holding company, develops resorts, properties, and other attractions in Malaysia and Indonesia. The company operates in two segments, Hospitality and Wellness, and Resort and Destination Development.It undertakes civil engineering works and property development and construction works. The company also constructs, maintains, and rents buildings; provides management, consultancy, and accommodation services; develops tourism complexes; operates and manages a recreational park; and develops and manages commercial and residential properties. In addition, it offers spa services. Landmarks Berhad was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
